message: Something with large wheels, not a typical Razor scooter, like this http://www.xootr.com/kick-scooter_mg.html or the Razor A5.
I would like to have a scooter for the space, for snack/parts runs.  I suppose we could consider a A1 community bike, but I'd like something small that will fit in the space.

After doing research, I recommend the Razor A5 at a pricepoint of $75-80.  I saw one in person today, it is designed for and looks big enough for most adults.  http://www.amazon.com/Razor-13013260-A5-Lux-Scooter/dp/B001K3JUEI

Ebay seller has the scooter that I decided upon, after research for $60 shipped.  They appear to be a Razor refurbisher or scratch and dent seller.  This beats the next best price by about $20.  I won't be able to buy one for the space right now, I will be using this to commute to the space myself, but if anyone wants to see mine once it comes in, I am happy to show it off.  http://cgi.ebay.com/RAZOR-A5-LUX-kick-Scooter-ages-8-Adult-LN-FAST-SHIP-/110705475753
Maybe he'll work out a deal with the shipping for 2 of them.
Here is an electric one on Craigslist for $45.  http://newyork.craigslist.org/wch/mcy/2465312218.html
Councilor, what are the laws regarding it's use?
not gonna get a hard time for the electric. it's muy heavy tho
